messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "mob_launch_master_plan_v3",
      "name": "Mobile App Launch – Master Plan & Milestones (v3)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-05T15:30:00-05:00",
      "content": "Mobile App Launch – Master Plan & Milestones (v3)
Owner: Alex Smith
Last updated: Nov 5, 2025

Overview
This document tracks the end-to-end plan for the Mobile App Launch (MOB), including milestones, scope, and dependencies.

Key Dates
- Planning milestone: Nov 10, 2025
- Development milestone: Nov 20, 2025
- Launch target: Nov 30, 2025

Current Focus
We are preparing for the 11/10 Planning milestone. Inputs for this milestone include:
- Implementation and risk details for MOB-101 (Core Feature)
- Latest performance findings from the early access cohort
- Weekly perf + growth rollups (see "Mobile App Launch - Weekly Update" series)

Pre-planning Sync (Alex & Jordan)
Tentative agenda for the pre-planning sync on Nov 6, 4:30–5:00pm ET (calendar event: "MOB: Pre-planning sync"):
1) Review status of MOB-100 (Initial Setup – Done) and confirm no remaining follow-ups.
2) Deep dive on MOB-101 implementation approach, including performance considerations on older Android devices.
3) Align on dev estimates and any risk areas that might affect the Planning milestone.

Related Docs
- Mobile App Launch - Weekly Update (Nov 3–7, 2025)
- MOB-101: Core Feature – Technical Notes (Jordan)

Jira References
- MOB-100 – Mobile App Launch - Initial Setup (Status: Done)
- MOB-101 – Mobile App Launch - Core Feature (Status: In Progress)"
    },
    {
      "id": "mob_101_tech_notes_jordan_v1",
      "name": "MOB-101 – Core Feature Technical Notes (Jordan)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-05T16:10:00-05:00",
      "content": "MOB-101 – Core Feature Technical Notes
Author: Jordan Johnson
Last updated: Nov 5, 2025

Context
This doc outlines the current implementation approach for MOB-101 (Core Feature) and captures performance and risk considerations ahead of the 11/10 Planning milestone for the Mobile App Launch (MOB).

Scope Summary
- Implement core feature surface in the main feed.
- Ensure acceptable performance on mid-tier and older Android devices.
- Integrate with existing telemetry to track cold-start and interaction latencies.

Performance Constraints
- Target: Maintain or improve current cold-start time despite new feature.
- Known risks: Additional database reads during initialization, extra network calls on first open.

Pre-Planning Sync Prep (Nov 6, 4:30–5:00pm ET)
Ahead of the "MOB: Pre-planning sync" calendar hold Alex sent, we should:
- Walk through the proposed initialization sequence.
- Validate assumptions for older Android devices.
- Confirm that the current estimate for MOB-101 still holds.

Input Docs
- Mobile App Launch – Master Plan & Milestones (v3)
- Mobile App Launch - Weekly Update (Nov 3–7, 2025) – see performance and growth sections."
    },
    {
      "id": "mob_weekly_update_2025_11_03",
      "name": "Mobile App Launch - Weekly Update (Nov 3–7, 2025)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-08T14:20:00-05:00",
      "content": "Summary

This week was a strong step forward for the Mobile App Launch (MOB).

Key wins
- Performance: We saw roughly a 15% improvement in cold-start time on mid-tier Android devices after the latest round of optimizations.
- Growth: Early access cohort grew by ~10% week-over-week as we expanded the invite pool and reduced sign-up friction.
- Stability: Crash-free sessions are holding steady above our target threshold despite the new feature work.

Details

1. Performance improvements (~15%)
Sam and Jordan landed the initial batch of optimizations on the feed rendering path. In synthetic benchmarks, cold-start time improved by ~15% compared to last week’s baseline. We’ll keep an eye on real-world telemetry over the next few days to confirm the gains hold at scale.

2. User growth (~10% WoW)
Top of funnel metrics for the early access program show ~10% week-over-week growth in activated users. The largest contributors appear to be:
- Smoother onboarding in the latest build
- Targeted outreach to high-intent users from the waitlist

Next week
- Lock the plan for the 11/10 Planning milestone and finalize scope for the next development phase.
- Validate performance gains on lower-end devices and in less reliable network conditions.
- Align with Engineering on remaining risk areas before we commit to the 11/30 launch date."
    },
    {
      "id": "mob_weekly_update_index",
      "name": "Mobile App Launch – Weekly Updates Index",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-08T14:25:00-05:00",
      "content": "Mobile App Launch – Weekly Updates Index

This sheet tracks weekly status docs and associated metrics for the Mobile App Launch (MOB).

Columns: Week Start | Doc Title | Doc Link | Perf Improvement % | User Growth % | Notes

Row (2025-11-03):
- Week Start: 2025-11-03
- Doc Title: Mobile App Launch - Weekly Update (Nov 3–7, 2025)
- Doc Link: https://docs.google.com/document/d/mob_weekly_update_2025_11_03
- Perf Improvement %: 15
- User Growth %: 10
- Notes: Used as input for 11/10 Planning milestone and Nov 6 pre-planning sync with Jordan."
    },
    {
      "id": "mob_planning_milestone_brief_2025_11_10",
      "name": "MOB – 11/10 Planning Milestone Brief",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-08T15:00:00-05:00",
      "content": "MOB – 11/10 Planning Milestone Brief
Owner: Alex Smith

Purpose
Summarize the key inputs and decisions needed for the Nov 10, 2025 Planning milestone for the Mobile App Launch (MOB).

Key Inputs
1) Weekly performance + growth metrics
   - Source: "Mobile App Launch - Weekly Update (Nov 3–7, 2025)"
   - Highlights: ~15% improvement in cold-start time; ~10% WoW growth in early access users.

2) Core Feature Implementation (MOB-101)
   - Source: "MOB-101 – Core Feature Technical Notes (Jordan)"
   - To be reviewed in the Nov 6 pre-planning sync (calendar event: "MOB: Pre-planning sync", 4:30–5:00pm ET).

3) Overall launch timeline and dependencies
   - Source: "Mobile App Launch – Master Plan & Milestones (v3)".

Discussion Topics for Planning
- Confirm scope and estimates for MOB-101 and follow-on tickets.
- Validate that recent performance gains provide enough buffer for upcoming features.
- Identify any risks that could threaten the Nov 30 launch date."
    },
    {
      "id": "mob_pre_planning_sync_notes_2025_11_06",
      "name": "MOB – Pre-planning Sync Notes (Alex & Jordan – Nov 6, 2025)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-06T17:05:00-05:00",
      "content": "MOB – Pre-planning Sync Notes (Alex & Jordan – Nov 6, 2025)
Meeting time: 4:30–5:00pm ET
Calendar event: "MOB: Pre-planning sync"
Participants: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson

Agenda (from calendar description)
- Review status of MOB-100 (done) and MOB-101 (in progress)
- Identify any blockers before 2025-11-10 Planning milestone
- Align on dev estimates for core feature work

Notes
1) MOB-100 (Initial Setup)
- Status: Confirmed Done. No remaining follow-ups.

2) MOB-101 (Core Feature)
- Reviewed implementation approach from "MOB-101 – Core Feature Technical Notes (Jordan)".
- Perf considerations: need additional validation on older Android devices.
- Estimate: Still reasonable assuming no surprises from the next round of perf testing.

3) Inputs to Planning Milestone
- Alex to update "MOB – 11/10 Planning Milestone Brief" with:
  - Summary of today’s discussion.
  - Link to latest weekly metrics doc: "Mobile App Launch - Weekly Update (Nov 3–7, 2025)".

Action Items
- Jordan: run perf checks on older devices and update Jira ticket MOB-101 with findings.
- Alex: finalize Planning milestone brief by EOD Nov 8 using these notes and the weekly update metrics."
    },
    {
      "id": "mob_calendar_holds_overview_q4_2025",
      "name": "MOB – Q4 2025 Planning & Launch Meetings Overview",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-05T16:20:00-05:00",
      "content": "MOB – Q4 2025 Planning & Launch Meetings Overview

Purpose
Track key meetings related to the Mobile App Launch (MOB) across Planning, Development, and Launch milestones.

Columns: Date | Time (ET) | Title | Organizer | Attendees | Related Docs | Notes

Row Example (Pre-planning sync):
- Date: 2025-11-06
- Time (ET): 4:30–5:00pm
- Title: MOB: Pre-planning sync
- Organizer: alex.smith@company.com
- Attendees: alex.smith@company.com; jordan.johnson@company.com
- Related Docs: Mobile App Launch – Master Plan & Milestones (v3); MOB-101 – Core Feature Technical Notes (Jordan); Mobile App Launch - Weekly Update (Nov 3–7, 2025)
- Notes: Prep discussion ahead of 11/10 Planning milestone."
    }
  ]
}
